links.title: MacBook Pro 15 (2018) - Beware the Core i9
links.description: Dave2D review of the 2018 15" Apple Macbook Pro. The Core i9 runs hot and throttles harder than any of the MacBooks I've ever used. MBP 15 - https://amzn.to/2LeK2Sd The 8th gen CPU from Intel has 6 cores but the thermal design of the 15" MacBook Pro isn't cut out for removing the heat.
